es.ull.datamining.filters

Class Normalize

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ull.datamining.filters.Filter
      • es.ull.datamining.filters.Normalize

  • public class Normalize
extends Filter
    This filter follow this formula: Sum((x_i-min)/(max-min)*scale+translation) default range [0-1].
    Author:
    Ivan Steven Ramirez Ladino (alu0100537321@ull.edu.es)
